h2_title: North Shore of the Bitter Lake
content: Since there's a good deal of important optional stuff (including some that can be missed if you proceed too far!) we'll start off checking the left side of the shore when facing the away from the water.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'North Shore of the Bitter Lake'.
The content is as follows:
Since there's a good deal of important optional stuff (including some that can be missed if you proceed too far!) we'll start off checking the left side of the shore when facing the away from the water.
